title: Feel pain in body whenever I read Quran (Baqarah) or during adhan, is it black magic assim al hakeem
transcript: so every time that I read the Quran especially Bak or when the aan is called I feel something in um the left side of my body um would it be possible that it's black m most likely it is your subconscious playing games on you see we tend to blame our failures over black magic evil lie envy and gin possession and this is one of our flaws and shortcomings so anytime we fail in doing something in communicating the spouses are unable to live a happy marriage the children we are unable to bring them uh to be practicing Muslims they have mistakes and problems and and this and that we blame these things and so many people watch videos and clips of people are possessed black magic signs of this and that and they store it in their subconscious until the right moment comes the subconscious make that makes that surface and this is what's most likely is happening to you I wouldn't say that you don't have black magic but I would say most likely it is nothing this tingling feeling is totally uh nothing alhamdulillah if you pray normally your AAR is normal your behavior is normal everything is normal it's just this tingling uh uh sensation or feeling this is shatan wanting you to stop reading Surah Al Bak because it is burning him like hell
